amendment.description: To provide a rule of construction regarding intelligence sharing.

vote.text: Amendment SA 195 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 195 proposed by Senator Lee for Senator Rubio. (consideration: CR S1829-1835; text: CR S1829) To provide a rule of construction regarding intelligence sharing.
